body:
Comment 19 by **nfa106**: 
The nbsp character gets garbled on both ssh clients I tried (openssh/putty), so all I
can get you is the address:

nfa@b3:~$ gdb gotest

There is NO WARRANTY, to the extent permitted by law.  Type "show copying"
and "show warranty" for details.

<http://www.gnu.org/software/gdb/bugs/>;...
